author: morciuch
msg: Made necessary changes to security registry editor and security user browser to support  the group role assignment functionality (see Bugzilla bug# 25405).

author: morciuch
msg: Applied patch by Evangelos Vlachogiannis for group-role security assignment (see Bugzilla bug# 25405). Also, added security cache and registry access controller functionality which was missing from the patch. No admin UI changes applied in this commit. All unit tests
Implicit role assignments where role only is specified, grant role within 'Jetspeed' group.
Implicit group assignments where group only is specified, join group with role of 'user'.
API change warning: JetspeedSecurity.getRoles(username) now returns iterator of GroupRole objects rather than Role objects.

author: morciuch
msg: Localized PSML Manager portlet (see Bugzilla bug# 25872)

author: morciuch
msg: Added support for groups in registry security constraints (see Bugzilla bug# 25871)
